information: Even though we were only founded in 2009, we already have many years of experience in the professional environment of working with textiles and bulk materials via an international team from Germany, Italy, Spain, Russia and many other nations, right through to a large number of patents for product ideas and innovative procedures. Developed from a traditional company, our expertise lies in unique market knowledge, high levels of creativity and a visionary management increasingly oriented towards the international market. We already export around half of our production. Starting with silos for wood pellets made from high-tech fabric, industrial and foodstuff designs through to prototype layouts for the artist Christo, Christmas decorations for international companies, special emptying systems with control functions, covers for outdoor areas through to special hangings for oak restoration in Norway.
products: Wood Pellets Silos (HPS) | Flat bottom silo for maximum volume use | Bunker Pellet Silo (BPS) | Wood Pellet storage (HPL) | Agriculture | Allg.Silotec | Covers for trailers - Car covers | Wood Pellets Silos (HPS) | Wood Pellet storage (HPL) | Small Silo
